attributes.action: Increase the penalty for using mobile phones while driving, to a minimum, 12 month driving ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current penalty is too lax.
Every day, more and more people are flaunting the rules, and ignoring the ban. For the safety of everybody, we need to get tougher on the use of mobiles while driving. Start enforcing the law, and take the licence off law breakers. Offenders will think twice, if a 1 year ban is in place, and there job is in jeapordy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
